text: Your family is going on a picnic, but no one packed plates and cups. Everyone is upset and doesn’t know what to do.
title: Family Picnic Mix-Up

text: Your parents are out and it is dinner time. Your younger brother is hungry, and starts crying.
title: Crying Bro

text: You have a family guest staying overnight. Everyone is wondering how to make space for the guest to sleep.
title: Guest sleep over

text: You are at the sports meet, and suddenly your shoe sole gets ripped off. You are called out to line up for a relay race and don’t know what to do.
title: Sports mishap

text: The soccer team can’t agree on a time for practice.
title: Soccer practise time
